title: M116 Blue Background - Cobb, Wagner, original envelope ++
author: loubrown

posts.post_title: M116 Blue Background - Cobb, Wagner, original envelope ++
posts.post_content: Also had these in the group.  I've never seen the envelope.  Pretty amazing group of stuff.  Not for sale at this point but may be soon.
Sorry if in the wrong spot - should have been in forums and def not in Tobacco.
Nice cards. As it looks like they will be for sale, this section is the correct spot. Good luck...

Are those cards glued or pasted to a paper backing and then cut out? Looks like that may be the case by the photos although it may also be multiple cards stacked up unevenly ….. I say this because of the edges looking “duplicated” …. no disrespect obviously nice cards ….
fantastic Trio Cards great colors and eye appeal on all cards
